parameters: \FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0019]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Flare>Ah, Supreme Commander... thank you for your hard work...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0019]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>I'm truly sorry for making you face such tough battles and
decisions.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>There's little we adults can do, but we'll support you as
much as we can.
\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0019]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Flare>Um... about the supply partner for Lavi...

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0009]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Flare>(No, after Kenji-sama, Guido-san had the most amount of
Ravi... so it wouldn't be possible to ask for a
replacement...)

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>I'm truly sorry to have entrusted the fate of the Earth to a
girl like you... The truth is, our organization has no other
choice but to rely on you... I'm truly sorry...

\FX[FFF]\AA[F]\FFF[1020Eriza_0005]Oh, oh. Is that Flare...? Good of you to come, shall we have
a little chat?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0009]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0016]\N<Eliza>I've started working under Guido, but, well, I've actually
felt more at ease. If there's any failure, it's not my
responsibility, hahaha!

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0016]\N<Flare>(Because of me, Eliza-san was demoted. Making her worry and
forcing such a strained laugh... I'm truly sorry...)
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[no]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>...Flare. Don't worry too much about it.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>Either way, we knew from the start that the BB gang was a
formidable opponent. Despite the twists and turns, your
achievement in defeating three monsters is significant.
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>You should be more proud of yourself.
\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[jump]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Flare>Excuse me, do we know the whereabouts of Kenji-sama!?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0007]\N<Eliza>I'm sorry... We're desperately gathering information, but as
of now, even his life or death is unclear...

\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[no]\F[1010Furea_0011]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0007]\N<Flare>Even his life or death... Oh no, could it be that Kenji-sama
is...!!

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[jump]\F[1010Furea_0011]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0013]\N<Eliza>Ha!! Sorry, I misspoke!! He must be alive! It's just that we
don't know his location!

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0001]\N<Eliza>We're putting all our effort into the search! We'll
definitely find him, so please wait with peace of mind!

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>If you're looking gloomy when he returns, he'll be sad too!!
Try to take it easy♪
